Description_lang: Increases your chance to block melee attacks by ${$s1}.1%.$?a317907[While inside your Consecration, your damage taken is reduced by ${-$188370s2}.1% and you have a chance equal to your block chance to reduce your damage taken from harmful periodic effects.][]Also increases your attack power by ${$s2}.1%.

description_blz.en_US:
Increases your chance to block melee attacks by 18.6%.

Also increases your attack power by 18.6%.
description_blz.es_MX:
Aumenta un 18.6% tu probabilidad de bloquear ataques cuerpo a cuerpo.

También aumenta tu poder de ataque un 18.6%.
description_blz.pt_BR:
Aumenta em 18,6% sua chance de bloquear ataques corpo a corpo.

Também aumenta em 18,6% o seu Poder de Ataque.
description_blz.de_DE:
Erhöht Eure Chance, Nahkampfangriffe zu blocken, um 18,6%.

Erhöht außerdem Eure Angriffskraft um 18,6%.
description_blz.en_GB:
Increases your chance to block melee attacks by 18.6%.

Also increases your attack power by 18.6%.
description_blz.es_ES:
Aumenta un 18,6% tus probabilidades de bloquear los ataques cuerpo a cuerpo.

También aumenta un 18,6% tu poder de ataque.
description_blz.fr_FR:
Augmente vos chances de bloquer les attaques de mêlée de 18,6%.

Votre puissance d’attaque est également augmentée de 18,6%.
description_blz.it_IT:
Aumenta la probabilità di bloccare gli attacchi in mischia del 18,6%.

Inoltre, aumenta la potenza d'attacco del 18,6%.
description_blz.ru_RU:
Повышает вероятность блокирования атак в ближнем бою на 18,6%.

Повышает силу атаки на 18,6%.
description_blz.ko_KR:
근접 공격을 방패 막기할 확률이 18.6%만큼 증가합니다.

또한 전투력이 18.6%만큼 증가합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW:
格擋近戰攻擊的機率提高 18.6%

同時使你的攻擊強度提高18.6%。
description_blz.zh_CN:
你格挡近战攻击的几率提高18.6%。

你的攻击强度也提高18.6%。
